post.title: Google Indexes ChatGPT Chats
post.excerpt: Without realizing it ons of unwitting people shared private chats with ChatGpT and then Google indexed them. Then Google tried to de-index them. Then the hackers found them through a different search query. https://x.com/vxunderground/status/1951215167573807380?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
